channel.title: How to change XP Rates and Make NPCs Fight Back?
channel.description: I have 667/712, and I was wondering how to make the NPC's fight back. The just stand there when I click fight. Also killing them is easy at level 1. How do I change it to a lower killing rate AND make NPC's fight back, cause they just stand there

item.title: How to change XP Rates and Make NPCs Fight Back?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

You probably haven’t configured the NPCs stats.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change XP Rates and Make NPCs Fight Back?
